title: BlueScope Mulls New $11 Billion Bid From Steel Dynamics, SGH
description: Australia’s BlueScope Steel Ltd. is considering a revised $11 billion takeover bid from Steel Dynamics Inc. and SGH Ltd. after rejecting a previous approach.
content: Australia’s BlueScope Steel Ltd. is considering a revised $11 billion takeover bid from Steel Dynamics Inc. and SGH Ltd. after rejecting a previous approach.
